ARABIC: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نَزَّلْنَا عَلَيْكَ ٱلْقُرْءَانَ تَنزِيلًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: It is We who have sent the Qur'an down to you little by little.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: We have revealed the Qur'an to you gradually;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: (O Prophet), indeed We have revealed the Qur'an to you in portions.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (Muhammad), We have revealed the Quran to you in gradual steps.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed We have sent down the Qur’an upon you, in stages.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, it is We Who have sent down the Qur'an to you by stages.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely We Ourselves have revealed the Quran to you revealing (it) in portions.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Surely We have sent down the Koran on thee, a sending down;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! We, even We, have revealed unto thee the Qur'an, a revelation;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Truly, it is We who have revealed to you the Quran, a gradual revelation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily We! it is We Who have revealed Unto thee the Qur'an, a gradual revelation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed We have sent down to you the Quran in a gradual descent.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: It is We Who have sent down the Qur'an to thee by stages.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily! It is We Who have sent down the Quran to you (O Muhammad SAW) by stages.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: We have indeed, sent down to you the Koran, a (clear) sending,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: It is We who sent down the Quran upon you—a gradual revelation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, it is We who have sent down to you, [O Muhammad], the Qur'an progressively.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [76:23] Assuredly We (nahnu reiterates the subject of innā, ‘assuredly, for the purpose of emphasis; alternatively it is a separating pronoun) have revealed the Qur’ān to you as a gradual revelation (tanzīlan is the predicate of inna, ‘assuredly’), in other words, We have divided it into parts instead of not revealing it all at once.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: 716 (Lo! We, even We, have revealed unto thee the Qur'an) We have sent you Gabriel with the Qur'an, (a revelation) in instalments: one, two and three verses at a time;
